entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Rain, 8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Moncton Roméo LeBlanc Int'l Airport 2:07 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
Condition: Heavy Rain
Temperature: 8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 7.4°C
Wind: E 31 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 10.

entry.title: Monday night: Showers or drizzle. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
